summary.para: [The feature associated with this page, DirectShow, is a legacy feature. It has been superseded by MediaPlayer and . MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine have been optimized for Windows 10 and Windows 11. Microsoft strongly recommends that new code use MediaPlayer and IMFMediaEngine instead of DirectShow, when possible. Microsoft suggests that existing code that uses the legacy APIs be rewritten to use the new APIs if possible.]
The DMO_INPUT_STREAM_INFO_FLAGS enumeration defines flags that describe an input stream.

member.name: _DMO_INPUT_STREAM_INFO_FLAGS.DMO_INPUT_STREAMF_WHOLE_SAMPLES
member.summary: The stream requires whole samples. Samples must not span multiple buffers, and buffers must not contain partial samples.

member.name: _DMO_INPUT_STREAM_INFO_FLAGS.DMO_INPUT_STREAMF_SINGLE_SAMPLE_PER_BUFFER
member.summary: Each buffer must contain exactly one sample.

member.name: _DMO_INPUT_STREAM_INFO_FLAGS.DMO_INPUT_STREAMF_FIXED_SAMPLE_SIZE
member.summary: All the samples in this stream must be the same size.

member.name: _DMO_INPUT_STREAM_INFO_FLAGS.DMO_INPUT_STREAMF_HOLDS_BUFFERS
member.summary: The DMO performs lookahead on the incoming data, and may hold multiple input buffers for this stream.
